title: Supplements - All Things Health
description: Supplements can be a good addition to your diet. From Traditional Chinese Medicine, it's important not to take supplements if you are in a deficiency stage.
cleaned_text: Help Fight The Flu](/en-us/natural-products/supplements/herbal-remedies/) Herbal remedies and formulas can help manage flu-like symptoms, such as a stuffy nose, sore throat, fever, chills, and body aches. Learn the best ones to take here.Read More
